Home News Documentation Downloads Community

Join our Community

The Myriad community is currently undergoing incubation at the Apache Software Foundation. Incubation status can be found here. Our community process follows the Apache Way. We encourage you to get involved in any way you can.

Join a Mailing List

Dev: Subscribe | Unsubscribe | Archives
Commits: Subscribe | Unsubscribe | Archives

Work the Code

Read about Myriad: We use Confluence for documentation.
Browse or Submit Bugs: We use JIRA for issue management.
Official Repo | Github mirror: Checkout the code.
Submit a patch: Use Github for pull requests.

Hangout with Developers

Apache Myriad developers gather bi-weekly for a Google Hangout to sync up commits, talk about features, upcoming events, and more. Subscribe to the dev mailing list to find out when and receive links to join before it starts.

Find us on Freenode IRC #myriad

Join us on Freenode IRC #myriad
